mapper.update: UPDATE sl_ec_team SET MEMBER_NAME=#{ememberName}, MEMBER_AGE=#{ememberAge}, MEMBER_EDUC=#{ememberEduc}, MEMBER_TEL=#{ememberTel}, CRT_ID=#{crtId}, CRT_TIME=SYSDATE() WHERE SL_CODE=#{eslCode} AND MEMBER_ID=#{ememberId}

UPDATE sl_ec_team SET SL_CODE = #{slCode}, MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}, LEADER_FLG = #{leaderFlg}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday}, MEMBER_NAME = #{memberName}, MEMBER_AGE = #{memberAge}, MEMBER_EDUC = #{memberEduc}, MEMBER_TEL = #{memberTel}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME=SYSDATE(), VER = #{ver} WHERE SL_CODE = #{slCode} AND MEMBER_ID=#{memberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sl_ec_team WHERE SL_CODE=#{eslCode} AND MEMBER_ID=#{ememberId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.SL_CODE FROM sl_ec_team AS A WHERE A.SL_CODE = #{filterMap.slCode}
